chapter1.title: The Mysterious Swamp
chapter1.description: You find yourself at the edge of a dark and mysterious swamp. The air is thick with fog, and the silence is eerie.

chapter2a.title: Into the Darkness
chapter2a.description: As you step into the swamp, the murky water engulfs your boots. The croaking of unseen creatures fills the air.

chapter2b.title: The Retreat
chapter2b.description: You decide not to risk the unknown and turn back, leaving the swamp behind.

chapter3a.title: In the Heart of Darkness
chapter3a.description: The swamp's darkness envelops you. Strange sounds echo around you, and your flashlight flickers.

chapter3b.title: A Wise Decision
chapter3b.description: You wisely choose to retreat, heading back to safety and leaving the swamp behind.
